INSERT INTO tb_res( res_num, si_num, m_id, res_cate_num, res_name, res_lat, res_long, res_photo, res_addr, res_price, res_tel, res_web, res_detail, res_start_time, res_close_time ) VALUES ( #{resNum}, #{siNum}, #{mId}, #{resCateNum}, #{resName}, #{resLat}, #{resLong}, #{resPhoto}, #{resAddr}, #{resPrice}, #{resTel}, #{resWeb}, #{resDetail}, #{resStartTime}, #{resCloseTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.res_num, r.res_name, r.res_detail, r.res_photo, r.res_addr, rc.res_cate_num, rc.res_type FROM tb_res AS r INNER JOIN tb_si AS si INNER JOIN tb_res_cate AS rc ON r.si_num = si.si_num AND rc.res_cate_num = r.res_cate_num WHERE si.si_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
